traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The yuan-ti's spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 12). The yuan-ti can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: At will: animal friendship (snakes only) 3/day each: poison spray, suggestion

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The yuan-ti has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The yuan-ti makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) slashing damage.

actions.name: Shortbow
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 4 (1d6 + 1) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) poison damage.
